title: 1 RP client change to Turkish... RIOT you baited me in to this
body: I am stuck in the Turkish servers becouse i wanted to check it out with my friends the change being only 1 RP. I  transfered my account from eu west. I would be ok with the change but i can't purchase RP so i can't buy myself into the other servers or anything and i only have 56 RP right now. So please i beg you RIOT, please, could you lower the price of the eu west transfer too to 1 for atleast a day. Please. <3

replies.body: There are still a few different payment methods available even if you can't use your personal card. Check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590), and click on TR to find out what all you can use on that server!
